modName: Skyrim Realistic Archery - Bows - Arrows - Crossbows - Bolts
summary: Skyrim Realistic Archery is a comprehensive overhaul of the archery mechanics in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5]READ THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR SRA TO WORK PROPERLY[/size][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58137-1-1412993886.jpg[/img][/center]

Skyrim Realistic Archery is a comprehensive overhaul of the archery mechanics in Skyrim

[list]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Aim-assist removed[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]First person aiming aligned with crosshair[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Third person aiming aligned with crosshair[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Realistic velocity applied to arrows/bolts[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Realistic gravity applied to arrows/bolts[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]All bows have the same draw time[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Arrows/bolts no longer disappear when fired at range[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Arrows/bolts now hit NPC's at range[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]NPC's flinch more often when hit by arrows/bolts[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Arrow/bolt stick duration now 1 second by default (optional)[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Max arrows/bolts that can be loose on the ground or stuck into objects increased from 15 to 100[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Collision radius of arrows/bolts decreased[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Arrow\bolt flesh impact SFX Now uses directional audio (stereo)[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Glow effect around arrows/bolts in flight removed[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Quick Shot perk's %30 draw speed bonus removed (optional)[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Arrows\bolts can now fly through semi-transparent meshes (experimental)[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Skyrim Unofficial Patch fixes applied for arrows/bolts/bows/crossbows[/size][/color]
[/list]

[size=5][b]INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS[/b][/size]

[color=#6d9eeb][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]
Mod Organizer[/url] [u]without[/u] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37347/?]Customizable Camera[/url][/color]

[color=#b6b6b6]Mod Organizer by itself will auto-merge the included INI edits with your "Skyrim.ini". So just install SRA through Mod Organizer and your ready to play.[/color]

[color=#6d9eeb][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url] [u]with[/u] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37347/?]Customizable Camera[/url][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?] [/url]
[color=#b6b6b6][size=2]If you are using Customizable Camera with Mod Organizer you must input these settings in the Customizable Camera MCM menu as shown below or third person aiming will revert back to (broken) vanilla behavior. [/size][/color][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]The rest of the settings on this MCM menu are optional.[/size][/color]

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58137-1-1413336149.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=#6d9eeb][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37347/?]Customizable Camera[/url] [u]without[/u] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url][/color]

[color=#b6b6b6]If your only using Customizable camera you must extract "Skyrim Realistic Archery.esp" into the "\Skyrim\Data" directory. Then change the values in your "Skyrim.ini" (C:\Users\**Your username**\Documents\my games\skyrim\Skyrim.ini) to match the values below or add the lines if they are not there. Finally you must change the values in the Customizable Camera MCM menu to match the values in the screenshot above.
[/color]
[color=#b6b6b6][Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=14000.0000

[Combat]
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.35
f1PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.35
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=1.1
f3PBoltTiltUpAngle=1.1
[/color][color=#b6b6b6]fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?][u]No[/u] Mod Organizer[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37347/?]Customizable Camera[/url][/color]

[color=#b6b6b6]If you do not have time to set up Mod Organizer or Customizable Camera you must extract "Skyrim Realistic Archery.esp" into the "\Skyrim\Data" directory. Finally you must change the values in your "Skyrim.ini" (C:\Users\**Your username**\Documents\my games\skyrim\Skyrim.ini) to match the values below or add the lines if they are not there.
[/color]
[color=#b6b6b6][Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=14000.0000

[Combat]
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.35
f1PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.35
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=1.1
f3PBoltTiltUpAngle=1.1
[/color][color=#b6b6b6]fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0

[Camera]
fOverShoulderAddY=-100.0
fOverShoulderPosZ=20.0
fOverShoulderPosX=0.0
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=-100.0
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=20.0
fOverShoulderCombatPosX=20.0[/color][/size]

[size=5]RECOMMENDED MODS[/size]

[list][*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26387/?]Simple Crosshair[/url] - Just a small dot in the center of the screen, perfection![/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37358/?]Ultimate Spinning Arrows[/url] - Arrows will realistically spin in flight[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53172/?]Better Eagle Eye and Steady Hand Redux[/url] - Tweak "zoom" and "slow time" levels when using these perks[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] - Lovely dynamic blood splatter (See screenshots!)[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17214/?]No Spinning Death Animation[/url] - NPC's will ragdoll after a fatal hit instead of entering a scripted death animation[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/?]Realistic Ragdolls and Force[/url] - NPC's realistically fall like dead weight after a fatal hit (See video!)[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54387/?]Immersive Sounds[/url] - Includes amazing replacement bow draw, release, and impact SFX[/size][/color]
[/list]

[size=5]NOTES[/size]

[list][*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]The Quick Shot perk at level 70 archery will increase draw speed by %30. This moves away from SRA's intended draw speed. If you already have this perk you can try the patch under misc to disable Quick Shot[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Archery without a crosshair in Skyrim is not recommended because the orientation of the hands/bow/knocked arrow in relation to the arrow upon release do not line up visually. This is clearly not realistic or practical. Disabling crosshair will not raise the skill ceiling, it will just create a handicap[/size][/color]
[/list]

[size=5]COMPATABILITY[/size]

[list][*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]SRA [u]is not[/u] compatible with any other ESP that changes vanilla bow/crossbow/arrow/bolt behavior under the "Projectile" or "Weapon" group.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]SRA [u]is[/u] compatible with any mod that changes arrow/bow meshes or textures[/size][/color]
[/list]

[size=5]MY OTHER MODS[/size]

[list][*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58219/?]No Dancing No Clapping[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58738/?]Scrolls Cast Instantly[/url][/size]
[/list]
[size=5]VIDEOS[/size]

[size=2][youtube]-56NyDXlTI0[/youtube][/size]
author: SIDWULF
